Changes

04/07/2021 Initial version. 04/11/2021 Adds Firestore field types to be used across all deserialization classes. 07/25/2021 Adds support for Firestore Timestamp fields. 07/25/2021 StateValidator class: Converts from/to and validate US state names and codes. 03/08/2024 Add Stripe service fees for international transactions.
